thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian may die, fears Kanye West - Khaleej Times

title: Kim Kardashian may die, fears Kanye West - Khaleej Times
text: Kim Kardashian may die, fears Kanye West IANS /Los Angeles Filed on February 21, 2017 | Last updated on February 21, 2017 at 3.20 pm Share More > Vote The rapper is fed up of his wife's plastic surgeries and fears she may end up like his mother, who died from complications. Rapper Kanye West is reportedly urging his wife and reality TV star Kim Kardashian to stop undergoing plastic surgery.According to a source, West fears his wife would end up like his beloved mother, Donda West, who passed away after complications from a routine plastic surgery in 2007."Kim can't stop. Kanye used to threaten her by telling her he would leave her if she continued getting work done. She can't deny it anymore," a source close to the couple told radaronline.com."Even though everyone is telling her she is starting to not look like herself, Kim thinks that the more plastic she looks the better," the source added. Share
